ETYMOLOGY: From the diminutive of the male given name Theodore (referring to U.S. President Theodore Roosevelt). The term gained popularity with the invention of the 'teddy bear' toy in the early 20th century, named after Roosevelt.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A soft toy bear, typically brown and cuddly, especially one called a teddy bear.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种柔软的玩具熊，通常为棕色且抱起来很舒服，特指泰迪熊。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: My daughter still sleeps with her favorite teddy.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我女儿睡觉时仍然抱着她最喜欢的泰迪熊。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A one-piece undergarment for women, combining a camisole and shorts or panties, often made of silk or lace.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种女士连体贴身内衣，通常结合了吊带背心和短裤或内裤，常由丝绸或蕾丝制成。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She chose a beautiful lace teddy for her honeymoon.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她为蜜月选择了一件漂亮的蕾丝连体内衣。
